resources.string: "'What would you say if I told you there is a app on the market that tell you if you have a hotdog or not a hotdog. It is very good! - Jian Yang 2017'"

"Use the 'Not hot dog' App to Scroll through a list clicking on popular food items scraped from the internet. Categorize them by selecting hot dog or not hot dog. Take a screenshot, then edit and share with your results with your friends. Have fun :)"
